content.layer 4 definition: Transport Layer - Provides end-to-end communication services and ensures reliable data delivery between applications.
primary functions: Segmentation: Breaking data into manageable pieces
Error detection and correction: Ensuring data integrity
Multiplexing: Multiple applications using same network
port addressing: Socket: IP address + port number combination
transport protocols: UDP: User Datagram Protocol (unreliable but fast)
service types: Connection-oriented: Establish session before data transfer
Connectionless: Send data without session establishment
